about_the_game:
In this world, colors live scattered across their individual regions. Violent robots are around every corner and there is an unsettling sense of fear everywhere. Struggling to survive each day, one cannot care about others, but it wasn't always like that. The colors were gentle and united in the past. There were no robots. Something must have happened. Uncover the truth behind the lies told in this first-person shooter.

You will explore different regions, each with its own biome, weapons and enemies.

Find pieces of hidden history and fix whatever happened to this place.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a mid violence level, such as non-realistic guns and characters shooting and being shot.

name: Color Corruption

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The colors are dispersed and disunited. Robots are scattered everywhere. There is no safe place, but it wasn't always like this. The colors were gentle and united in the past. There were no robots. Something must have happened. Can you uncover the truth of this story?
